turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good morning! I'd like to get a Starbucks order in so I can pick it up on my way to work.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! I'll get that ordered for you. What kind of drink are you looking at getting?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I'd like an Iced White Chocolate Mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okie Dokie! They've got three sizes, Tall Grande and Venti.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I can never remember what those are.  Which one is the medium?  I'll take that one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The Grande is the medium. Next question, what kind of milk do you want in it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh jeez, that's a good question. What are my options?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Almond, Coconut, Soy, and all three varieties of regular milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: OK. Um, I guess I'll go with Almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Grande, Almond Milk, White chocolate. Do you want whipped cream on it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Of course! The more the better!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! Alright, Grande Iced White Chocolate Mocha with Almond Milk and Whipped Cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it. Oh, wait! Can you ask for light ice?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: One second. Yup, I can put in a comment, so I'll put it in there.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great! Anything else you need from me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: One more, I need to know where you want to pick this up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh yeah, that would help. I'll be getting it at the one on Jimmie Leeds.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. Done, placed with your Starbucks account. Your drink should be ready soon at the Jimmie Leeds store, you should be getting your receipt as a text message soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Got it! Thanks, you've been a real help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem! Have a great day!
